Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.name: init(_:)
Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.abstract: Public constructor. if the category id is not set then category is initialised to the UNCATEGORISED.

Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.name: init(_:)
Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.abstract: Public constructor. if the category id is not set then category is initialised to the UNCATEGORISED.

Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.name: toString()
Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.abstract: Prints a full idName path to the category.

Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.name: getParentCategory()
Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.abstract: Returns the parent category of a sub-category.

Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.name: isParent()
Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.abstract: Finds whether a category is a top-level category.

Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.name: isSub()
Structs/TransactionCategory.html#/s:20Sm.abstract: Finds whether a category is a sub-category.

Structs/ZenParams.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.name: MAX_INTERVAL
Structs/ZenParams.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.abstract: Maximum ZenScore sequence calculation time interval in days.

Structs/ZenScore.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFr.name: Score
Structs/ZenScore.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFr.abstract: Score. Falls in range (0; 1). The higher the score is the better user’s financial health on the given day.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.name: id
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.abstract: Transaction Id. Should be set and controlled by the customer.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.name: amount
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.abstract: Amount. Used by budgets and budget alerts

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.name: bookingDate
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.abstract: Booking Date. Used by budgets and budget alerts, Zen scores

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.name: customProperty1
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.abstract: Customer property one, reserved for customer’s use.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.name: customProperty2
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.abstract: Customer property two, reserved for customer’s use.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.name: init()
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:20SmartCarro.abstract: Empty constructor. Transaction Id is initialised with an empty string, transaction currency is set to “CHF”

Structs/Budget.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFram.name: accountId
Structs/Budget.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFram.abstract: Account Id. Is not taken into account for calculations, reserved for future use.

Structs/Budget.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFram.name: currency
Structs/Budget.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFram.abstract: Currency. Is not taken into account for calculations, reserved for future use.

Structs/Budget.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFram.name: alert
Structs/Budget.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFram.abstract: Budget Alert Threshold, a notification will be sent if it has been reached

Structs/ZenScore.html.name: ZenScore
Structs/ZenScore.html.abstract: Zen Score. Represents user’s financial health for a given date.

Structs/TransactionCategory.html.name: TransactionCategory
Structs/TransactionCategory.html.abstract: The type used for Transaction Categories, their hierarchies, identfiers and id mappings.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: budgetDidAlert
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: A Budget Did Exceed its threshold limit

Extensions/Notification/Name.html.name: Name
Extensions/Notification/Name.html.abstract: The type used for the names of CarrotContext emitted notifications.

Enums/CategorisationType.html#/s:20Smart.name: nonPersonal
Enums/CategorisationType.html#/s:20Smart.abstract: The Optimised Native model will be used for categorisation. Personalised user’s learning won’t be taken into consideration.

Enums/CategorisationType.html#/s:20Smart.name: personal
Enums/CategorisationType.html#/s:20Smart.abstract: The Personalised Model will be used for categorisation.

Enums/BudgetFrequency.html#/s:20SmartCar.name: monthly
Enums/BudgetFrequency.html#/s:20SmartCar.abstract: Montly, starts from the first day of a month

Enums/BudgetFrequency.html#/s:20SmartCar.name: annual
Enums/BudgetFrequency.html#/s:20SmartCar.abstract: Annual, starts from the first day of a year

Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.name: wrongBundleId
Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.abstract: License has been issued for a different application bundle id.

Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.name: failedToLoadModel
Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.abstract: Failed to load the AI model file.

Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.name: notAuthorised
Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.abstract: Customer is not authorised to use the API.

Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.name: saveError
Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.abstract: Writing the personalised model to persistent storage failed.

Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.name: loadError
Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.abstract: Loading the personalised model from persistent storage failed.

Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.name: encryptionKeyNotSetError
Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.abstract: Encryption key is not set. It is required to store transactions and related entities in the persistent storage.

Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.name: encryptionInvalidInitialisationVectorError
Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.abstract: Encryption Initialisation Vector is not set or invalid. It is required to store transactions and related entities in the persistent storage.

Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.name: emptyEntityId
Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.abstract: Entity being saved into the persistent storage has an empty id. Entity ids should be managed by the customer application.

Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.name: zenScoreNoBudgets
Enums/CarrotContextError.html#/s:20Smart.abstract: No budgets were set for Zen Score calculations. Please set at least one and repeat.

Enums/CategorisationType.html.name: CategorisationType
Enums/CategorisationType.html.abstract: Defines the model type used for categorisation.

Classes/CarrotContext.html#/s:20SmartCar.name: init()
Classes/CarrotContext.html#/s:20SmartCar.abstract: Public constructur. Returns a new instance of a CarrotContext class.

Classes/CarrotContext.html#/s:20SmartCar.name: setLicense(license:)
Classes/CarrotContext.html#/s:20SmartCar.abstract: Applies library license. Throws an Error if the license is invalid.

Classes/CarrotContext.html#/s:20SmartCar.name: seLicense(license:encryptionKey:encryptionIV:)
Classes/CarrotContext.html#/s:20SmartCar.abstract: Applies library license and sets encryption parameters. Throws an Error if the license is invalid.

Classes/CarrotContext.html#/s:20SmartCar.name: setEncryption(key:iv:)
Classes/CarrotContext.html#/s:20SmartCar.abstract: Set Encryption parameters. The encryption parameters are required for storing data in the persistent storage. If the encryption keys were not set, then all persistent related methods will throw

Classes/ZenAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFram.name: buildZen()
Classes/ZenAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFram.abstract: Builds an array of ZenScores based on user’s saved financial information.

Classes/ZenAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFram.name: buildZen(startDate:endDate:)
Classes/ZenAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotFram.abstract: Builds an array of ZenScores based on user’s saved financial information.

Classes/TransactionAPI.html#/s:20SmartCa.name: delete(transactions:)
Classes/TransactionAPI.html#/s:20SmartCa.abstract: Deletes an array of Transactions from the persistent storage. The method uses Transaction.id to identify a transaction to be deleted.

Classes/TransactionAPI.html#/s:20SmartCa.name: getAllOrderByDateDescTextId()
Classes/TransactionAPI.html#/s:20SmartCa.abstract: Returns all transactions from the persistent storage, sorted.

Classes/TransactionAPI.html#/s:20SmartCa.name: getById(id:)
Classes/TransactionAPI.html#/s:20SmartCa.abstract: Returns a transaction by it’s id. Returns nil if there is no transaction with such an id in the persistent storage.

Classes/TransactionAPI.html#/s:20SmartCa.name: categorise(transactions:)
Classes/TransactionAPI.html#/s:20SmartCa.abstract: Categorises an array of transactions and updates them in the persistent storage

Classes/TransactionAPI.html#/s:20SmartCa.name: categorise(transaction:)
Classes/TransactionAPI.html#/s:20SmartCa.abstract: Categorises a transaction and updates it in the persistent storage

Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.name: upsert(budgets:)
Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.abstract: Updates or inserts an array of budgets in the persistent storage. Identifies budgets by their id.

Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.name: delete(budgets:)
Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.abstract: Deletes an array of budgets from the persistent storage. Identifies budgets by their id.

Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.name: getAll()
Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.abstract: Finds all budgets from the persistent storage.

Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.name: getAllOrderByNameId()
Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.abstract: Finds all budgets from the persistent storage, sorted.

Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.name: getById(id:)
Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.abstract: Finds a Budget by its id, nil if the Budget was not found.

Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.name: getTransactionsCount(budget:)
Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.abstract: Finds a count of transactions, which match the Budget by:

Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.name: getTransactionsCount(budget:year:month:)
Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.abstract: Finds a count of transactions, which match the Budget by:

Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.name: getRunningTotal(budget:year:month:)
Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.abstract: Calculates budget running total as per selected year and month.

Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.name: getBalance(budget:year:month:)
Classes/BudgetAPI.html#/s:20SmartCarrotF.abstract: Calculates budget balance as per selected year and month.

Classes/BudgetAPI.html.name: BudgetAPI
Classes/BudgetAPI.html.abstract: The BudgetAPI class provides access to various incremental budget related functionality.

Classes/CategorisationAPI.html.name: CategorisationAPI
Classes/CategorisationAPI.html.abstract: Allows you to categorise and learn a user’s personalisation setting.

Classes/TransactionAPI.html.name: TransactionAPI
Classes/TransactionAPI.html.abstract: A TransactionAPI implements all the storage and categorisation functions on Transaction.

Classes/ZenAPI.html.name: ZenAPI
Classes/ZenAPI.html.abstract: ZenAPI class is responsible for building Zen Scores.

Classes/CarrotContext.html.name: CarrotContext
Classes/CarrotContext.html.abstract: Carrot Context class. Them main entry point into the Framework.
